msbt.message: You can just FEEL the quality in this thing. I wish everything was made out of whatever it's made out of.
You've got a great sense for luxury, . Almost as good as mine!
I've always wanted something like that. It's weird that you knew!
I can't wait to find just the right spot for it back at the casa de .
This is really going to snazz up my place. I'm feeling snazzy just thinking about it!
I know exactly where I'm gonna put this.You should come to the soft launch of my house rebrand and check it out!
Haven't I seen something like this beforeor was that just an extremely cinematic dream I had?
I think Blathers already has something like this in his collection.Fortunately, I'm a collector myself Of course, my specialty is in shoes.
I don't know what that was, but it definitely looked old. And old stuff is super classy.
Whoa! This seems really rare. I'm not sure I should take itYeah, I'm gonna pass on this one. I think you should give it to Blathers, .
This is a fossil, right?<10_4 /> Cool!If I display this, folks will really start buying into my Professor persona.
As the French like to say, "Aloha!" It means "thank you."Not only do I love it, I have the perfect place for it, .

Uh, are you serious right now? This thing is crazy rare!I wish I could accept it, but then I would owe you like three gazillion thank-you gifts, . Does it look like I'm made of Bells? If so, that's completely intentional.

I don't think anyone's ever given me something so utterly amazing in my entire life, . Which is why it kills me to say I cannot accept it.As a professional admirer of fine things, I'm qualified to categorize this piece as "fine plus." If you take it to Blathers, I'm sure he'll give it all the special attention that it deserves.
This is the kind of gift that I've got to try on right away!
Whoa, this is different from my usual style. But I'll try on anything that looks cute. Here we go!
Let's see if we can make this good hair day a GREAT hair day!
Let's try this baby on right now!
Ah, let's see what the world looks like through these!
Well, a gift like this just begs to be tried on right away.
Oh yeah. The color is exquisite.
Hey, not bad! Really, really not bad at all! Dare I saygood?!
Thanks, ! I'm pretty jazzed about the way I look.
Whoa! This really pushes my boundariesin a good way. Thanks, !
I don't want to be rudebut this is awesome.<10_4 /> See? I wasn't rude.
Hey, you can never have too many of these. Thanks, !
I'm sure I can find a use for this. Thanks, !
Gotta love an island-themed gift. Way to coordinate!
You know, I'm not really the umbrella type, but this is great regifting fodder, so I'll take it.
Yo! This will keep my hair dry in ALL kinds of weather. Thanks for thinking of the do!
Arigato, . I'll think of you when I fire this up!
Hey, you never know when this kind of thing might come in handy on an island. Thanks!
Ooh! Could you hear my tummy rumbling? Is that why you got me this ?
Just gonna tuck that away forfive minutes from now.
Aww, these are really pretty! What do you call them? ?
I've got just the place for these back home.
Ha! Look at that little go!
I've always wanted a pet like that
Haha! Look at that little guy scramble! That's , right?
It'll be fun having this around to freak out my bug-phobic friends. Thanks, !
Hey, this is really cool, but don't you think Blathers would like it?I don't want him to think I'm poaching any primo specimens, so why don't you just bring it to him.
Hey, this is really cool, but don't you think Blathers would like to see it?I don't want him to think I'm trying to poach his top-notch specimens, so why don't you just bring it to him.
Is this happening? You're giving me ?
Ah, the striking scent of saltwater It's simply intoxicating.Something to keep in mind when I design my next line of fragrances. Anyway. Thanks, .

Thanks muchisimo! Was Blathers jealous when you told him I'd be the one in possession of Huh? He hasn't seen it yet?As grateful as I am that you thought of me first, I think you should give this to Blathers, .
Yoyou're really gonna do me like that? You're just gonna give me ?
Here, take it back and think it through a little more the next time you want to try a prank.
Wait—you're giving me Bells?
I don't think that's a good idea, . It feels more like a business transaction than a gift. I appreciate the thought, but I can't accept it.
Oh, um You just gave me .Not really sure what else to say!
I guess anything could come in handy at some point on an island like this, huh?

Could this bea DIY recipe for ?I know I'm, like, the second-coolest resident on this island, but not even I deserve a gift this awesome. I might regret saying this, but you need to keep this for yourself.
But don't worry, . I got the messageand I'm a big fan of yours too.
Could this be ?
I could not love a gift more.Of course, if you find a pair of silk- lined velvet joggers in my size, I'd have to reconsider that statement.
No way! You actually got me !
It's been on high rotation in my brain lately. Now it can be on high rotation in my real life too!
So is this the kind of stuff you like to listen to? I feel like I need to sit down and really HEAR it, you know?
